name: Faction Media - Out of Business
description:
Faction Media is a digitally-grounded, business-to-business marketing agency that believes you should do more than make contact with your customers – you should Make Allies. Founded and run by “digital natives” since 2005, Faction Media takes an uncommon approach to finding common ground between our client companies and their customers, overcoming marketing challenges with measurable, customer-focused solutions across all media.
We believe that our digital perspective is your best strategy for uncovering marketplace insights, building valuable customer relationships, and generating demand for innovative B2B products and services.
